results.title: Applying a Therblig check list
results.brief_description: Illustrates how a Therblig checklist can be applied to jobs for the purpose of developing an improved method. The program demonstrates several jobs being performed and then applies the appropriate check list question for the purpose of devising an improved method.

results.title: Application of Pascal's Law. Part 1. The Hydraulic jack
results.creator_credit: United States. Navy. Bureau of Aeronautics
results.brief_description: The film reviews Pascal’s Law, and studies the input and output pistons and the system in actual motion. Demonstrates how work is done by means of a hydraulic system and how the amount of work performed is measured.

results.title: Apples in Tasmania
results.creator_credit: Fred Whatham and Cine Austral Productions
results.brief_description: Traces the development and locations of the apple-growing industry in Tasmania. Illustrates activities related to the planting, culture, harvesting and marketing of apples. Narrated by Roger Climpson. Suitable for Upper Primary-Upper Secondary students.

results.title: Apples from your garden
results.brief_description: Instructional film for gardeners on apple growing from cordons and bush trees; describes grafting, budding, choice of root stock to suit different types of soil, digging of soil and the planting of cordons and bush trees. No other credits available.

results.title: Apples and pears: the Australian story
results.brief_description: Focuses on the story of apple and pear production in Australia from fruitgrower to exporter, and is supplemented by a comprehensive teachers guide which provides an interesting approach to effective use of the video material - planning an advertising campaign.
results.description: Focuses on the story of apple and pear production in Australia from fruitgrower to exporter, and is supplemented by a comprehensive teachers guide which provides an interesting approach to effective use of the video material - planning an advertising campaign.

results.title: Apple iPhone 3
results.brief_description: Smartphones like the Apple iPhone allow instantaneous recording and sharing of videos. Along with social media, they’ve helped establish and spread social and political movements, while filmmakers have also shot entire films on the portable devices.
results.description: The power to record, document, and film footage is now in everyone’s pocket. Mobile camera phones like those found in the Apple iPhone allow users to capture the world around them and share videos instantly. Along with the advent of social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, the camera phone was an important development in digital connectivity and the spread of social movements like the Arab Spring, Occupy Wall Street and Black Lives Matter. It has also become a modern tool for moviemaking, with filmmakers like Steven Soderbergh, Sean Baker, Jay Alvarez, Park Chan-wook and Michel Gondry shooting whole feature films with mobile cameras.
description_for_label: The power to record, document, and film footage is now in everyone’s pocket. Mobile camera phones like those found in the Apple iPhone allow users to capture the world around them and share videos instantly. Along with the advent of social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, the camera phone was an important development in digital connectivity and the spread of social movements like the Arab Spring, Occupy Wall Street and Black Lives Matter. It has also become a modern tool for moviemaking, with filmmakers like Steven Soderbergh, Sean Baker, Jay Alvarez, Park Chan-wook and Michel Gondry shooting whole feature films with mobile cameras.

results.title: Apple aphis
results.creator_credit: Stephen Ackroyd, Shell Film Unit and J.V. Durden
results.brief_description: Discusses briefly five of the most destructive of the family Aphididae which attack apple trees and fully illustrates the life-cycle of one of them, the green apple aphis. Using micro-photography techniques the various stages in the life-cycle are shown - from the emergence of the nymph from the egg through to mating and reproduction. A final diagrammatical section summarizes the life-cycle.
